com.atakmap.android.gui.drawable

Class ShadowDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • com.atakmap.android.gui.drawable.ShadowDrawable

  • public class ShadowDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
    A drawable which renders a shadow under a given View This works similar to NavButtonDrawable but does not auto-pad the original drawable. It simply creates a shadow that is rendered under a given view. Padding may be necessary to prevent the shadow from being cut off.
